win: sat down and did 60min on tracker app
lesson: need to set intention before deep work or get lost in small random tasks
change: write ONE goal on sticky before starting each deep work block

win: Did OMAD and noticed energy feedback in real time
lesson: Large single meal at ~3 PM was followed by a strong sleepy crash by ~5:30 PM; could be post-meal dip and/or weed recovery fatigue.
change: Tomorrow run a simple test: smaller meal load or split intake and add a 10-15 min walk post-meal; log energy at +1h/+2h/+3h.

win: Day 2 clean - stayed honest about feelings instead of numbing
lesson: Feeling very down and lonely. Moved from Calgary 5 years ago and haven't rebuilt a friend circle in Houston. Catching myself focusing on what I don't have instead of what I do. Unsure if withdrawal sadness or real sadness - probably both. Last time meditation helped pull out of this.
change: Restart meditation. Life is what you make it - there is a lot to be thankful for. Focus on gratitude not absence.

win: Recognized the binge/crash pattern - it applies to fitness too not just substances
lesson: Addictive personality goes 100% at everything including fitness → unsustainable intensity → crash → revert to binge mode. The same all-or-nothing wiring that drives substance abuse drives overtraining.
change: Monitor intensity in fitness - sustainable > maximal. When noticing 100% mode kicking in flag it as the same addiction pattern.
